schools.name: Ashton-Franklin Center Middle School
schools.school-summary: Ashton-Franklin Center Middle School, a public school located in Franklin Grove, IL, serves grades 5-8 in the Ashton-Franklin Center Community Unit School District 275.
schools.district-name: Ashton-Franklin Center Community Unit School District 275
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Ashton-Franklin Center Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Ashton-Franklin Center Elementary School, a public school located in Franklin Grove, IL, serves grades PK-6 in the Ashton-Franklin Center Community Unit School District 275.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 6 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
